name: Quentin 2035
description:
Quentin 2035 | Early Access

Become the one you once were.

Quentin 2035 is a computer, adventure, mystery and puzzle video game where the player will put himself in the skin of a detective. He will have to deal with different types of cases, find the necessary clues to rule out defendants and solid enough to impute the suspect in front of a trial.

Developed on 2017/18.

The Team

Game Designer  -  Oriol Caminal Miró

Main Programmer  -  Xavier Devesa Queraltó

Secondary Programmer  -  Marc Martos Cabré

Artist  -  Bernat Rico Soteras
